lead_paragraph: Tesla Motors agreed to buy the solar panel maker SolarCity for $2.6 billion in stock in a merger aimed at creating a one-stop shop for cleaner energy.

headline.print_headline: Shares Are Lower as Oil Prices Plummet
headline.main: Shares Are Lower as Oil Prices Plummet

snippet: Tesla Motors agreed to buy the solar panel maker SolarCity for $2.6 billion in stock in a merger aimed at creating a one-stop shop for cleaner energy....
abstract: Stocks finish mostly lower with energy companies taking biggest losses due to strong dollar causing oil prices to fall.
